title: Leveling champs to 7 is waaaaay too expensive
body:
Hey guys,

So this latest patch is crazy, everythings all fresh and exciting, so much new things to try, having a blast trying the new op.

There's only one problem.

Leveling to level 7 now cost close to 8k blue essence, and when we're only earning roughly 1000 per level (if that, and not just 300) its actually quite a depressing moment when u finally get your tokens, and realise you have 4 levels to go until u can actually do anything with them.

I'd like to suggest lowering the BE cost to 1000 BE for 6 and 1500 for 7, i think all things considered this is reasonable.

Anyways leave your thoughts below.

Cheers.

replies.body: Yeah for sure! I won't be able to level up my Quinn because I won't have enough blue essence for another 5 levels :( feelsbad, thought rito would make it at least equivalent to the old system.... {{item:3070}}
It's equivalent when you only take into account the champion shards you get, but they forgot the fact that now that it's tied into everything having it the "same" price isn't the same price at all.

Just to level up my current eligible champs to level 6, NOT 7, would cost 32,500 be.
I feel like having a champion mastery should require being a master of that said champion, not just spending an absurd amount of blue essence for an emote. {{summoner:6}}
